items.title: Canva para Principiantes
items.headline: Tu guía de Canva para diseño gráfico
objectives_summary: Crea una cuenta con Canva, la mejor plataforma gratuita de software de diseño gráfico online.
Domina cada uno de los elementos que conforman Canva, desde texto, imágenes, objetos a vídeo y música.
Navega por los muchos diseños y plantillas prediseñados de Canva.

items.title: Sketch a Hut using Pens, Inks and Watercolors
items.headline: Draw a sketch which is better than the photograph!
objectives_summary: Understand how to use pens, inks, watercolors in harmony to create stunning sketches
Understand how to break down a photograph into basic shapes and convert it into a sketch
Learn how to create a sketch which looks better than its reference photograph

items.title: Artistic Digital Portrait Painting
items.headline: Concise and unique course on digitally painting photo-realistic portraits for beginners to advanced
objectives_summary: Practical techniques in digital portraits painting
Choosing skin colours and working with a palette
Painting eyes, noses, lips, ears in proper anatomic proportions
